title: 3dAmpToRSFC
description: Convert spectral amplitudes into standard RSFC parameters.

in_amp.title: Input Amplitudes
in_amp.description: Input file of one-sided spectral amplitudes, such as output by 3dLombScargle.

in_pow.title: Input Power Spectrum
in_pow.description: Input file of a one-sided power spectrum, such as output by 3dLombScargle.

prefix.title: Output Prefix
prefix.description: Output file prefix; file names will be: PREFIX_ALFF, PREFIX_FALFF, etc.

band.title: Frequency Band
band.description: Lower and upper boundaries of the low frequency fluctuations (LFFs), within the interval [FBOT, FTOP].

mask.title: Mask
mask.description: Volume mask of voxels to include for calculations.
